title: AMQP operation bindings object
description: This object contains information about the operation representation in AMQP.

expiration.description: TTL (Time-To-Live) for the message. It MUST be greater than or equal to zero.

userId.description: Identifies the user who has sent the message.

cc.description: The routing keys the message should be routed to at the time of publishing.

deliveryMode.description: Delivery mode of the message. Its value MUST be either 1 (transient) or 2 (persistent).

mandatory.description: Whether the message is mandatory or not.

bcc.description: Like cc but consumers will not receive this information.

replyTo.description: Name of the queue where the consumer should send the response.

timestamp.description: Whether the message should include a timestamp or not.

ack.description: Whether the consumer should ack the message or not.

bindingVersion.description: The version of this binding. If omitted, "latest" MUST be assumed.
